name: CrossNotes
description:
Game type

Strategy Role Playing Game

Story background

Due to the intervention of different external energies, there is a cross phenomenon between various spatial planes.
Heroes from different worlds have come to your world.
This is the story of your adventure with outsiders.

Core gameplay

This is a Japanese Q-version style battle chess game. The choice of action for each character is the key to your victory. Under your command, fight to the death with the enemy.

Game features

A large number of rich, cute, and interesting characters
■ Clearly differentiated character and unit positioning Rich level gameplay
■ High degree of process freedom

Character preview

Battle action diagram
